Okay,so how can I make this work in Vista 32?I made all Applications xp compatible and use the HW exe......???????? Help?

To make this game look better, here's what you'll have to do.
First Download latest Zackenzack's glide wrapper 0.84c (OpenGL) @ http://www.zeckensack.de/glide/ or DgVoodoo (Direct3D) 
I use Zacken with these settings from top to bottom
16, Try High Res, 60hz (if LCD; CRT anything it supports) By App (default), By App (default), +3.00 and LOCK it down, 16x Aniso, leave gamma as is unless it's to bright, Simple shaders (Default) Own Window, Classic.

Then you go into Carmageddon2/Data and change these in Options.txt.
YonFactor 1.000000


CarTexturingLevel 3

RoadTexturingLevel 3

WallTexturingLevel 3

ShadowLevel 3


Yon 35.000000 (set this as high as you want 125.000etc is good for 8800GT. Now start the game and Enjoy! if the screen is black try alt tabbing a couple of times until the menu is visible.
Ohh btw, sometimes the whole screenarea is not accessible with zackenzack in high res mode. Don't know a cure for that, sorry. But you can use arrow keys to get there.
